chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Silviana Brehon, p. 44 (37)—Mistress of Novices in the White Tower. She is from the Red Ajah, and was appointed by Elaida after Sheriam left the Tower. She is stocky, and has a square face. Elaida herself goes to her occasionally for “voluntary” penanaces. See also Bayanar, Sheriam; Keeper of the Chronicles; Noselle, Tiana.
